name: Steel Banglez
description: '''Pahuldip Singh Sandhu''' (born 5 February 1987), known by his stage name '''Steel Banglez,''' is a British record producer and musician of [[Punjabis#Punjabis in India|Punjabi]] descent. He is currently signed to [[Warner Bros. Records]]. Best known for his production work with artists including [[Mist (rapper)|Mist]], [[MoStack]], [[J Hus]] and [[Wiley (musician)|Wiley]], Steel Banglez achieved his first chart hit as a lead artist when his track "Bad" reached the top 30 on the [[UK Singles Chart]] in February 2018. His highest-charting single on the UK Singles Chart is "[[Fashion Week (song)|Fashion Week]]" featuring British rappers [[AJ Tracey]] and [[MoStack]] which peaked at number 7.
